ipv6-ula-generator.cardInputDescription: Enter a MAC address to generate IPv6 ULA (Unique Local Address) prefixes using the IETF-recommended method.
ipv6-ula-generator.cardResultsDescription: IPv6 ULA prefixes generated based on your MAC address. Click any value to copy it to the clipboard.
ipv6-ula-generator.label: Label
ipv6-ula-generator.info: This tool uses the first method suggested by IETF using the current timestamp plus the mac address, sha1 hashed, and the lower 40 bits to generate your random ULA.
